Note. Use the default HTML Format Provided!
sub_fields.default_value:
• U-verse TV & Internet:
    $75.00/mo for 50 Mbps + U-family
      * 10 to 50 Mbps depending on exact location with no data cap.
      * TV: U-family

      * Contract Term: 1 year with up to $180 ETF.
      * Modem w/ WiFi included.

      * 100 Mbps down and 100 Mbps up w/ a 1000GB/mo data cap.
      * 1 year promo rate. Regular rate is $60.00.
      * Contract Term: 1 year with up to $180 ETF.
      * Setup: Up to $99 installation cost.
      * Modem w/ WiFi included.
  • Internet 300:
    $70.00/mo for 300 Mbps w/ 1 TB Data.
      * 300 Mbps w/ a 1000 GB/mo data cap.
      * 1-year promo rate.Regular rate is $80.00.
      * Contract Term: 1 year with up to $180 ETF.
      * Setup: $0 (Installation cost waived)
      * Modem w/ WiFi included.
  • Internet 1000:
    $90.00/mo for 1000 Mbps.
      * 1000Mbps w/ no data cap.
      * 1-year promo rate.Regular rate is $100.00.
      * Contract Term: 1 year with up to $180 ETF.
      * Setup: $0 (Installation cost waived)
      * Modem w/ WiFi included.

sub_fields.instructions:
Please Input AT&T Plans Here.
Note. Use the default HTML Format Provided!
sub_fields.default_value:
• Liberty 12:
    $50.00/mo for 12Mbps w/ 12GB Data
      * Priority Data with downloaded speeds of up to 12Mbps w/ a 12GB data cap
      * Contract Term: 2 years
      * Once Priority Data is used up, speeds will be reduced to up to 1 to 5 Mbps during the day and possibly below 1 Mbps after 5pm. Free zone from 3am to 6am daily.
      * Setup: $150 (Includes standard installation.)
      * Modem: $10/mo
  • Liberty 25:
    $75.00/mo for 12Mbps w/ 25GB Data
      * Priority Data with downloaded speeds of up to 12Mbps w/ a 25GB/mo data cap
      * Contract Term: 2 years
      * Once Priority Data is used up, speeds will be reduced to up to 1 to 5 Mbps during the day and possibly below 1 Mbps after 5pm. Free zone from 3am to 6am daily.
      * Setup: $150 (Includes standard installation.)
      * Modem: $10/mo
  • Liberty 50:
    $100.00/mo for 12 Mbps w/ 50GB Data
      * Priority Data with downloaded speeds of up to 12Mbps w/ a 50GB/mo data cap
      * Contract Term: 2 years
      * Once Priority Data is used up, speeds will be reduced to up to 1 to 5 Mbps during the day and possibly below 1 Mbps after 5pm. Free zone from 3am to 6am daily.
      * Setup: $150 (Includes standard installation.)
      * Modem w/ WiFi $10/mo
  • Unlimited Silver 25:
    $150.00/mo for 25Mbps
      * Internet: 25Mbps w/ no data cap.
      * Contract Term: 2 years
      * After 100GB of data usage, your data may be prioritized behind other customers during network congestion.
      * Setup: $150(Includes standard Installation.)
      * Modem w/ WiFi: $10/mo.
